description: These fabulous potato pancakes always feel like a treat. Make 4 individual-sized rosti if you prefer.
keywords: Potato bake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Simple Potato Rosti Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the whole, peeled potatoes to the boil in a large pan of salted water. Reduce to a simmer and cook for 7-10 minutes, depending on size, until part-cooked but still firm. Leave to cool, then grate coarsely and toss with salt and pepper.

Melt the butter and oil in a 20-22cm frying pan. Put the potato in the pan and squash it down with a spatula to make a large, flat pancake. Cook over a medium heat for 5-7 minutes, until crispy underneath.

To turn, slide the potato pancake onto a large plate. Put another plate on top and flip the whole thing over, so the cooked side is uppermost. Slide back into the pan and cook for a further 5-7 minutes until crispy underneath. Cut into wedges to serve.
